description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Queen of the South vs Inverness CT in the Scottish League One
title: Queen of the South vs Inverness CT: Scottish League One stats & head-to-head
title_page: Queen of the South vs Inverness CT: Scottish League One stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Full Time
Second Half ends, Queen of the South 4, Inverness CT 1.
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Post
Benjamin Luissint (Queen of the South) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Goal!
Goal! Queen of the South 4, Inverness CT 1. Adam Brooks (Queen of the South) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Lewis O'Donnell.
Post
Taylor Charters (Queen of the South) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
